aka: May They Rest in Revolt (Figures of War)
this_title: Qu'ils reposent en révolte (Des figures de guerre)
trans_title: May They Rest in Revolt (Figures of War)
introduction: We see over a period of three years —July 2007 to January 2010—, the living conditions of migrants in Calais, France. It shows how the policies undertaken by modern States go beyond the framework of the law, and create spaces of indistinction between the exception and the rule, in which the individuals are treated like criminals and stripped of the most basic rights.源自：https://47.mostra.org/en/filmes/que-descansem-sem-paz-imagens-da-guerra-47a
chinese_title: Qu'ils reposent en révolte (Des figures de guerre)
